attachments.title: Why use Julia to build an Earth System Model?
attachments.text: Hi all, Most Earth System Models are written in Fortran, but may be re-written in another language because Fortran has some issues running on GPU based supercomputer. Some consider using C instead, but there are many arguments to use Julia, as <http://clima.caltech.edu|clima.caltech.edu> are doing. <https://www.nature.com/articles/d41586-019-02310-3> We started a discussion on Slack #climate, but I am posting it here to not lose the thread, and have the possibility to add more arguments.
